data.utilizationMethod: Wrap your fingers around one end of the dumbbell handle, letting the far weight act as the striking head, and swing that far end downward in hammering motions

data.proxyObjectName: small succulent plant in a yellow ribbed pot
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the pot’s ribbed sides with fingers curving underneath and thumb on the outer wall, keeping the plant upright (not sure whether it is applicable)
Grip the rim of the plate between thumb and fingers, raise it, shift the plate to rest on the palm, rotate it slowly, then place it back down
Grip the blower’s main handle, rest the nozzle tip on the bench seat, and push then pull the tool straight along the seat surface
Hold one loose end of the coil between thumb and middle finger, press and release the springy rope bundle with the index finger
Press your open hand into the cushioned seat and release

data.proxyObjectName: green Lay's Sour Cream & Onion potato chip bag
data.utilizationMethod: Press the air-filled bag flat on the desk and give quick light pats to its center with your open hand
